entry.title: My Dogtor Thinks I'm Dying
entry.summary:
Author: brsfic

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,484Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 73

Summary: Stiles doesn’t think there’s anything wrong with him, except maybe chronic over-caffeination. But his dad’s retired K-9, Bandit, disagrees. According to TikTok, that means cancer. Or seizures. Or secret pregnancy. Cue Stiles in an exam room, shirt off, face burning, while Derek Hale—yes, that Derek Hale, his long-forgotten high school crush turned absurdly hot doctor—takes his medical history like it’s no big deal. It’s fine. Totally fine. Not a meet-cute. Definitely not.

entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 85,070Chapters: 53/75Kudos: 50

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.title: when everything changes (but it all stays the same)
entry.summary:
Author: undercoverbastard

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,224Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 27

Summary: "Repeat that for me," Derek finally said. His eyes bore into the wall across the way - the one that held their favorite photo. It was a disastrous shot, taken only seconds into the cliched cake cutting scene from their wedding. Stiles had an almost deranged grin on his face that screamed of joy, pride, and white frosting. Derek was looking down at his frosting smeared shirt, his hand a blur where it was moving to try and do damage control but would soon launch into Stiles' own hand and send another bite of cake and frosting across them both. They put that photo on the wall as it seemed to perfectly capture the chaos that enveloped their lives together. It was frustrating at times, but it was fun - always unexpected. Something they thrived on equally. "I said," Stiles patiently responded, ending his momentary reflection on their disastrous wedding photo, "we need to get a divorce." "Alright," Derek said, nodding, "I thought that's what you said. Now tell me why you said it." +.+.+ OR: a bit of hurt/comfort fueled by discussions of divorce. People are sad/hurt but not for the reasons you think. It isn't (that) bad, promise! But if you need a bit of sad fluff(?) then this is the quick read for you!

entry.title: Pure Madness
entry.summary:
Author: Hamahthesith

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,992Chapters: 2/20Kudos: 0

Summary: Stiles could still remember the first time his mother explained the importance of epigenetic memory. In spite of the trauma associated with such genetic continuity, she stressed the importance of remembrance in all of its various forms. He hadn't truly understood until a madness claimed Beacon Hills as it's home. Only he has the genetic continuity, the memories, to free the minds of their hometown. With the occasional assistance of an overbearing sour wolf, oh, and his pack of wolves.

entry.title: you can get what you want but it's never enough
entry.summary:
Author: wishingonalightningbolt

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,452Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 86

Summary: “Look, a couple weeks ago, my dad was—he was having a time, okay? He was lecturing me about my dating life and how he wants to have grandkids before he dies, and he got all emotional about my mom and—I’m not good at handling that, okay?”“So you what? Told him we got back together?”He shrugs, avoiding Derek’s gaze. “He loves you, okay? When we broke up, he was so pissed at me, and I just—I wanted to make him happy. Why not let him believe a little white lie for a while, right?”-0-A year after their breakup, Stiles ropes Derek into pretending like they're back together. Derek confronts a treasure trove of feelings.

entry.title: Designation 19621
entry.summary:
Author: fanficreader5

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,944Chapters: 19/19Kudos: 755

Summary: “My designation is 19621, sir.”   Stiles stares at him. “That's quite the mouthful. Any chance you have a, like, normal name?” “Derek,” the cleaner says eventually. He looks at the red button on the wall and then glances away. Stiles follows his gaze and blanches. “Dude, I’m not gonna shock you for telling me your name.”_____The new werewolf cleaner for Stiles' PhD group is grumpy and aloof and maybe a genius. As Stiles gets to know him, he can't help but wonder if there's any way to get that collar off him.

entry.title: The golden couple
entry.summary:
Author: Anything00but

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,568Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 25

Summary: Stiles is dating Derek. Everyone says they are to perfect couple, the golden couple. A relationship everyone can only dream about. And it is- it really is- at least that's what Stiles keeps telling himself. He's happy with Derek, he loves the alpha, truly. But it's not what he wants, and he knows it deep down, as days keep blending together, and he keeps going through the motion just to keep others happy because they keep telling him to hold on to this relationship.Then Peter starts catching Stiles' attention, and for the first time in years Stiles feels like he can breathe. With Peter there's no expectations, no image to uphold. Just him, Stiles, and Peter sees him. Not the spark, not the alpha's boyfriend, just Stiles.

Author: MightyHoneyBadger

Summary: Stiles Stilinski has the worst luck: another day, another kidnapping. Blindfolded, bound, and stuck with a swamp monster demanding Scott’s whereabouts, he’s seconds from panic when Derek Hale tears the door off its hinges. But saving Stiles isn’t enough—Derek can still smell the creature all over him, and nothing less than erasing that scent will do. What starts as a rescue turns into something darker, hungrier, and impossibly intimate. Derek needs Stiles marked inside and out, and Stiles—well, he’s more than willing to let him.

entry.title: Chaos Come Again
entry.summary:
Author: SierraStyx

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 80,788Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 1,000

Summary: Stiles has a good life. He has a great job, a great husband, and he's happy in Virginia. The pack is doing fine under Scott's leadership back in California. Aside from the grisly murder scenes he sees on cases, Stiles' life is actually pretty perfect. Which is of course, when everything goes wrong.Basically Stiles is part of the BAU team, and the Nogitsune returns. Mind games ensue. There are not nearly enough crossovers where Stiles is on the team, so idk here you go, brought to you by the voices in my head. Also in this fic Stiles and Derek didn't get together until Stiles was well into college, because I think canon-era Stiles/Derek is really creepy.
